intro.title: Hi, I'm Kristi!
intro.content: I'm a web developer with over 6 years of experience creating websites and webshops. I've worked on a variety of projects, ranging from simple brochure websites to complex e-commerce platforms, and I have experience with both small and large-scale projects.

blocks.title: Frontend:
blocks.content: JavaSript (ES6), TypeScript, React, CSS/SASS, RWD, Storybook

Adobe (Photoshop, Illustrator, Xd), Sketch,
Attlassian software (Jira, Confluence&Bitbucket), 
Github, Storybook

projects.title: Barn Registry
projects.description: A barn admin panel website for cows provides a comprehensive and efficient solution for managing livestock, helping farmers and livestock managers to make informed decisions and improve their operations. Real data comes from government ARiMR API

projects.title: UI Kit
projects.description: A UI kit developed in React is a collection of reusable user interface components and design elements that are built using the React library. This kit provides a comprehensive set of UI building blocks, such as avatars, buttons, popup, forms, icons, and typography, that can be quickly and easily integrated into React-based projects.

projects.title: Balu Shop
projects.description: The project is a modern webshop developed using TypeScript and React (+ React Redux Toolkit) for the frontend, and a headless CMS called Strapi for the backend. Payments are supported by Stripe
projects.tech_stack: Frontend: React, TypeScript, CSS Modules (SCSS). Backend: Strapi (Headless CMS)

projects.title: Portfolio page
projects.description: Personal website built with React and TypeScript. Fun fact: portfolio can be easily adapted by anyone to meet their needs, with only updating config.json file.

projects.title: Poetry
projects.description: 'Poetry' is a digital platform that presents a collection of poems.

projects.title: Art Odlew
projects.description: My role in this project involved the only to development aspect, where the website was built using WordPress as the content management system. The WordPress instance included ACF components, and for the project was written custom theme in PHP from the backend perspective. Frontend was based on JavaScript and CSS (business requirement)

projects.title: AZ Frame
projects.description: My role in this project involved the only to development aspect, where the website was built using WordPress as the content management system. The WordPress instance included ACF components, and for the project was written custom theme in PHP from the backend perspective. Frontend was based on JavaScript and CSS (business requirement)

projects.title: Transport Slomka
